result.execSummary:
The defendant Samara L Bosman was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possession of THC, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(e).
  • Possess Amphetamine/LSD/Psilocin, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(3g)(d).
  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: Maintain full time employment and/or school.
Maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol. Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then only take in the amount and frequency prescribed.
Defendant can apply in writing for expungement upon successful completion of Probation and all conditions.
Complete any counseling, evaluations, programs and assessments as appropriate resulting from the Department's COMPAS assessment.
Obtain AODA assessment and comply with treatment recommendations.

Pay costs on each count of the action. Pay supervision fees as ordered by Dept. of Corrections. If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due. All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.

timeConds.notes: Perform 80 hours of uncompensated community service for a non-profit agency.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Samara L Bosman

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Defense waives reading of Information, is prepared to proceed to plea. Court reviews charges, max. penalties, elements. Defendant enters no contest pleas to Counts 1, 2, 3. Court questions Defendant on rights, finds pleas made freely and voluntarily, accepts pleas, and finds Defendant guilty of Counts 1, 2, 3. State/Defense make joint sentencing recommendations. Bond no longer in effect.
Defendant Samara L Bosman in court with attorney Amber R. Gratz. Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews previous activity, is prepared to proceed to plea/sentencing.

Defendant Samara L Bosman in court with attorney Amber R. Gratz. Raymond L. Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews previous activity. Defense advises that Defendant will waive prelim, advises of offer made by State. Court questions Defendant, finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver and binds Defendant over for trial. Bond continues as is.  Arraignment scheduled for October 9, 2014 at 10:30 am.
and Order for Substitution of Attorney
Additional Request for Electronic Discovery for Door County Cases

No contact direct or indirect with RK, QN. Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then only take in the amount and frequency prescribed. Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.

Defendant Samara L Bosman in court with attorney Gregory A. Gerbers. Raymond L. Pelrine appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews charges, max. penalties, right to counsel, right to prelim. Defense advises that Defendant will waive time limits for prelim. Court questions Defendant, finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver. Bond set.  Status conference scheduled for August 28, 2014 at 03:00 pm.
